metadata.dcterms:title: Fatty Acid Composition of Novel Host Jack Pine Do Not Prevent Host Acceptance and Colonization by the Invasive Mountain Pine Beetle and Its Symbiotic Fungus
metadata.dcterms:creator: Ishangulyyeva, Guncha
Najar, Ahmed
Curtis, Jonathan M
Erbilgin, Nadir
metadata.dcterms:description: We evaluated if composition of fatty acids impede or facilitate colonization of jack pine (Pinus banksiana) by the invasive mountain pine beetle (Dendroctonus ponderosae) and its symbiotic fungus (Grosmannia clavigera).
metadata.dcterms:subject: Fatty acids
mountain pine beetle
host range expansion
antifungal and antifeedant
alpha-linolenic and linoleic acids
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Fatty Acid Composition of Novel Host Jack Pine Do Not Prevent Host Acceptance and Colonization by the Invasive Mountain Pine Beetle and Its Symbiotic Fungus
